Schedule Your Free AI Visibility Audit

See exactly where you stand before committing to anything. Our 30-minute audit shows you what's possible with our three-layer system—with no obligation to proceed.

What You'll Get in Your Free Audit:

Live AI Testing - Watch as we test your business across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Grok in real-time. You'll see exactly if and how AI mentions your business (or doesn't).

Competitor Analysis - We'll identify which tourism businesses in your region are winning AI recommendations and show you what they're doing differently.

Network Opportunity Map - We'll identify 3-5 potential partner businesses in your area perfect for Network Effects implementation.

Custom Roadmap - Get a detailed plan showing exactly how we'd implement all three layers (Network Effects, Dual Content, Explicit Direction) for your specific business.

ROI Projection - Based on your current traffic and our client data, we'll project your expected improvement in AI mentions and booking increases.

No Obligation - The audit is educational, not a sales pitch. You'll walk away with valuable insights whether you sign up or not.

Get in Touch

Or email us directly: ricky@foundonchat.com

What Happens After You Submit?

Step 1: We'll email you within 24 hours to schedule your 30-minute audit at a time that works for you.

Step 2: Before the call, we'll do preliminary research on your business and competitors so the audit is tailored to your specific situation.

Step 3: During the audit, we'll screen-share to show you live AI testing and walk through exactly what we'd do for your business.

Step 4: After the call, we'll send you a summary PDF with all findings, recommendations, and our custom roadmap.

Step 5: You decide. If you want to proceed, we'll get started immediately. If not, you keep the insights at no cost.

Common Questions Before Scheduling

Q: Is this really free with no strings attached?

A: Yes. The audit is genuinely educational. We believe if we show you what's possible, the value will be obvious. No high-pressure sales tactics.

Q: Do I need to prepare anything for the audit?

A: Just have your website URL ready and be prepared to talk about your business, target customers, and current marketing challenges. We'll handle the rest.

Q: Can I bring a business partner or colleague to the audit?

A: Absolutely! In fact, if you're considering Network Partnership, we encourage you to bring potential partners so they can see the audit together.

Q: What if I already have an llms.txt file?

A: Perfect! We'll show you what it's missing and how our three-layer system builds on top of it. Many clients already have llms.txt when they come to us.

Q: I'm not tech-savvy. Will I understand the audit?

A: Yes. We explain everything in plain English with live demonstrations. No confusing jargon. If you can browse a website, you'll understand the audit.
